attributes.title: Ed Skrein
attributes.twitter: http://twitter.com/edskrein'''Edward George "Ed" Skrein''' (born 29 March 1983) is a British actor and musician. In his music career he has worked with Asian Dub Foundation and Plan B. He has recently transitioned into acting, appearing in Plan B's movie ''Ill Manors''.In ''Game of Thrones'' Skrein played the role of Daario Naharis in the Season 3
